Summary: a disk flying to the north from the south on a clear night with white light on its outer edge
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around May 21st 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsIT WAS 9;30pm I WENT OUT TO LOOK FOR MY CAT, I WAS LOOKING UP AT THE STARS IN THE SOUTHERN SKY, WHEN A FAST MOVING LIGHT IN THE SKY,AT FIRST I THOUGHT THAT IT MAY BE A MYLAR BALOON[THEY USUAL TUMBLE IN THE WIND],AS IT GOT CLOSER IT LOOKED TOO BIG,IT WAS A SPINNING DISK WITH WHITE LIGHT ON ITS LEADING EDGE,BRIGHTER IN THE FRONT, DIMMER AND THE TRAILLING EDGE, AND HOLDING A STEADING COURSE,WITH A SLIGHT ROLL TO THE LEFT AND THEN TO THE RIGHT,THEN LEVEL FLIGHT,IT LOOK LIKE A FLYING HALO, BUT THE OBJECT MOMENTARY BLOCKED OUT A VIEW OF A STAR, SO IT WAS A SOLID OBJECT, THERE WAS NO SOUND,AND NO CLOUDS IN THE SKY, AS IT FLEW OVERHEARD MY CAT BECAME SCARED AND RAN INSIDE, I LOST SIGHT OF THE OBJECT DUE THE ROOF OF THE HOUSE AND RAN TO THE BACKYARD TO SEE IT AGAIN FOR A COUPLE OF SECONDS BEFORE MY VIEW WAS BLOCKED BY THE TREES. THIS WAS NO AIRCAFT THAT I HAVE EVER SEEN, AND I HAVE LIVED NEAR KELLY AIRFORCE BASE FOR MORE THAN HALF MY LIFE.
